      • bfs

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,BFSData> bfs(java.lang.String from,
                                          java.lang.String to,
                                          java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> tickets)
                                            throws NoPathFoundException
        This search includes ticketspecific path-finding. While processing it already keeps track of the tickets only ways the figure can go are returned.
        Parameters:
        from - from where?
        to - the target position
        tickets - initial tickets of the figure
        Returns:
        unfiltered map containing the path
        Throws:
        NoPathFoundException - thrown if there is absolutly no way from 'from' to 'to' with these tickets

      • orderTickets

        private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> orderTickets(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> tempLinks)
        Order the tickets.
        Parameters:
        tempLinks - Map with the links
        Returns:
        Map with ordered tickets

      • filterBFSResults

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,BFSData> filterBFSResults(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,BFSData> bFSResults,
                                                       java.lang.String target)
        take the result from the bfs and process it to a Map with stations as keys and moves to the next station as BFSData with no overhead
        Parameters:
        bFSResults - the unfiltered results of the BFS
        target - the targeted position
        Returns:
        only BFSData needed are returned.
